context_left: You need a simple and effective way to identify what is happening across your user’s cloud accounts. [
context_right: TAP](https://www.proofpoint.com/us/products/advanced-threat-protection/targeted-attack-protection#:~:text=Proofpoint%20Targeted%20Attack%20Protection%20(TAP,through%20malicious%20attachments%20and%20URLs. now provides extended visibility into suspicious login threats targeting Office 365 and G Suite cloud accounts.
sentence_left: You need a simple and effective way to identify what is happening across your user’s cloud accounts.
sentence_right: now provides extended visibility into suspicious login threats targeting Office 365 and G Suite cloud accounts.
label: Proofpoint is an enterprise security company based in Sunnyvale, California that provides software as a service and products for inbound email security, outbound data loss prevention, social media, mobile devices, digital risk, email encryption, electronic discovery ("eDiscovery”), and email archiving. It claims over half of the Fortune 100 as users of its solutions.

context_left: In addition to helping you detect compromised accounts, [TAP SaaS Defense](https://www.proofpoint.com/us/products/advanced-threat-protection/targeted-attack-protection) also helps identify high exposure file sharing and risky third-party applications in the cloud.
